menu.name: Black Truffle Risotto
menu.detail: Indulge in the luxurious flavors of black truffles combined with creamy risotto, a culinary masterpiece that will tantalize your taste buds.

menu.name: Kobe Beef Steak
menu.detail: Experience the ultimate indulgence with our Kobe beef steak, renowned for its exceptional marbling and melt-in-your-mouth tenderness.

menu.name: Foie Gras Sushi
menu.detail: Savor the exquisite combination of delicate foie gras and expertly prepared sushi rice, a fusion of luxury and tradition that will leave you craving more.

menu.name: Lobster Thermidor
menu.detail: Delight your senses with our decadent lobster thermidor, featuring succulent lobster meat enveloped in a rich, creamy sauce and gratinated to perfection.

menu.name: Wagyu Beef Burger
menu.detail: Indulge in the unparalleled richness of Wagyu beef with our gourmet burger, crafted with premium ingredients and served with a side of truffle fries.

menu.name: Alaskan King Crab Legs
menu.detail: Treat yourself to the delicate sweetness of Alaskan king crab legs, served with drawn butter and lemon for a taste of seafood perfection.

menu.name: Caviar Tasting Platter
menu.detail: Elevate your dining experience with our caviar tasting platter, featuring a selection of the finest caviars from around the world accompanied by traditional garnishes.

menu.name: Golden Opulence Sundae
menu.detail: Indulge in the ultimate dessert experience with our Golden Opulence Sundae, featuring the rarest ingredients and edible gold leaf for a truly decadent treat.

bookings.name: Hehe
bookings.specialRequest: Make it as child friendly as you can
